Name: MongoDB - Add or update user roles
Description: Adds roles to an existing user in a MongoDB database.
Author: twerthi

Parameters.Name: MongoDBServerName
Parameters.Label: Server Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name or IP address of the MongoDB server instance.

Parameters.Name: MongoDBPort
Parameters.Label: Port
Parameters.HelpText: Port number the MongoDB instance is listening on.

Parameters.Name: MongoDBDatabaseName
Parameters.Label: Database Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the database to use.

Parameters.Name: MongoDBAdminUsername
Parameters.Label: Admin Username
Parameters.HelpText: User account with rights to query the users in the database.

Parameters.Name: MongoDBRoles
Parameters.Label: Roles
Parameters.HelpText: A comma-delimited list of roles to add the user account.
